data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Puebla to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Puebla, Mexico
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Puebla that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Puebla, Mexico to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 4,944,155 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Puebla, Mexico today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Japanese people. Make the Japanese people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Puebla hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Puebla, Mexico.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Puebla. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
